subject: very weird instagram account
body:
[this youtube compilation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AYA8AhxQyFQ) of clips of [marc bolan's TV show](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc_\(TV_series\)) in the seventies

every week at the grocery store i look for [pomelo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pomelo), hoping that it will finally be pomelo season, and every week i am disappointed, including this week, but then d pointed out that i had missed them by the grapefruits and they actually _were_ there this week; i got two.

this very weird instagram account [claire](https://www.instagram.com/clocarus/?hl=en) shared that's [someone roleplaying as rory gilmore but in the present day](https://www.instagram.com/storyofagilmoregirl/)

the song "[pink pony club](https://open.spotify.com/track/4xeGlEItAGRsWFykY7ixjW)" which d has been addicted to and has such a very pretty bridge melody (i'm thankful to have looked up whether there was a real pink pony club and found only alabama's "[pink pony pub](https://pinkponypub.net/)" which makes me want an oasis cover of this song

d made chocolate chip cookies for the first time in a long time and they were as good as always
normalized_markdown:
[this youtube compilation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AYA8AhxQyFQ) of clips of [marc bolan's TV show](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc_\(TV_series\)) in the seventies

every week at the grocery store i look for [pomelo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pomelo), hoping that it will finally be pomelo season, and every week i am disappointed, including this week, but then d pointed out that i had missed them by the grapefruits and they actually _were_ there this week; i got two.

this very weird instagram account [claire](https://www.instagram.com/clocarus/?hl=en) shared that's [someone roleplaying as rory gilmore but in the present day](https://www.instagram.com/storyofagilmoregirl/)

the song "[pink pony club](https://open.spotify.com/track/4xeGlEItAGRsWFykY7ixjW)" which d has been addicted to and has such a very pretty bridge melody (i'm thankful to have looked up whether there was a real pink pony club and found only alabama's "[pink pony pub](https://pinkponypub.net/)" which makes me want an oasis cover of this song

d made chocolate chip cookies for the first time in a long time and they were as good as always
